China's 'Dalifornia,' a bohemian haven for young people searching for meaning
description: In the southern Yunnan province, Dali is the city of those who say 'no' in silence. This somewhat hipster haven has welcomed more and more young people eager to escape the crushing megacities of a country where growth is sputtering. This gentle form of opposition has not gone unnoticed by the authorities.

description: On Friday, the US president responded to statements made by former Russian president Dmitry Medvedev, as he continues, so far unsuccessfully, to try to push Vladimir Putin to negotiate over Ukraine.

headline: Ukraine breaks up 'corruption scheme' in defense sector
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky said in a statement: 'I am grateful to the anti-corruption agencies for their work. It is important that anti-corruption institutions operate independently,' amid his first serious political crisis since taking office six years ago.

headline: In 'Chief of War,' Jason Momoa reigns over a Hawaiian tragedy
description: The actor who gained fame in 'Game of Thrones' is behind this surprising historical series that chronicles the unification of the Hawaiian archipelago and the arrival of foreign powers.

headline: Jean-Luc Brendel, a 'geek' of plant-based cuisine
description: 'Chefs' Gardens' (4/5). On his estate in eastern Riquewihr, this Alsatian chef cultivates plants that give the dishes at his restaurant, La Table du Gourmet, their unique flavor.

'In Germany, the punks made music to express themselves': Mark Reeder, an avant-garde night owl
description: 'Being 20 in West Berlin' (6/6). In the late 1970s, as English pop dominated the world, Mark Reeder instead swore by German electronic music. He left his native Manchester at 20 to discover Berlin, its clubs and its music.

headline: In Monaco, chef Marcel Ravin's Creole garden
description: 'Chefs' Gardens' (3/5). Since 2022, the Martinique-born chef, who has been awarded two Michelin stars, has planted Caribbean varieties within the Monegasque palace that houses his fine dining restaurant.

headline: Drugs, an Xbox and smoked duck: The man who could smuggle anything into prison
description: In a French prison, Samy R. became a specialist in supplying his fellow inmates with all kinds of goods by corrupting the guards.
